meanings.definition: The study of abnormal cellular changes.
meanings.sent1: In cytopathologies, scientists examine unusual cell transformations.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use cytopathologies to investigate irregular cell changes in patients.
meanings.sent3: The class on cytopathologies was so interesting that even the cells were paying attention!
meanings.sent4: Her fascination with cytopathologies was like a detective solving mysteries in the cellular world.
meanings.sent5: Through cytopathologies, the hidden secrets of cells are revealed under the microscope.

meanings.definition: Abnormalities in cell structure or function.
meanings.sent1: The lab report revealed cytopathologies in the patient's cells.
meanings.sent2: Cytopathologies can indicate health issues that need further investigation.
meanings.sent3: The cytopathologies in the cell were causing quite a commotion among the other organelles.
meanings.sent4: The cytopathologies were like roadblocks hindering the cell's normal functions.
meanings.sent5: The microscope unveiled a world of cytopathologies lurking within the cell structure.
